**Distance**","fontColor":"#c9f0ff","fontSize":"large"}},"viz_xgZsQX7f":{"type":"splunk.image","options":{"preserveAspectRatio":true,"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://632eadbc0c6ec370201fc113"}},"viz_toFuD7zU":{"type":"splunk.rectangle"}},"dataSources":{"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=fitbit source=fitbit:steps | rename value as Steps | chart max(Steps) OVER _time","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}}},"ds_search_2":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=fitbit source="activity.csv" 
| rename "Minutes Fairly Active" as fairly, "Minutes Lightly Active" as lightly, "Minutes Sedentary" as sedentary, "Minutes Very Active" as very
| eval fairly1=round(fairly/60,2)
| eval lightly1=round(lightly/60,2)
| eval sedentary1=round(sedentary/60,2)
| eval very1=round(very/60,2)
| stats values(fairly1) as "Fairly Active" values(lightly1) as "Lightly Active" values(sedentary1) as Sedentary values(very1) as "Very Active" by Date","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}}},"ds_search_3":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=fitbit source="fitbit:steps" value!=0 | rename value as Steps | chart avg(Steps)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}}},"ds_search_4":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=fitbit source="fitbit:floors" value!=0 | rename value as Floors | chart avg(Floors)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}}},"ds_search_5":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=fitbit source="fitbit:distance" | rename value as Distance
| stats sum(Distance)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}}},"ds_search_6":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=fitbit source="fitbit:steps" | rename value as Steps | chart max(Steps)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}}}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{}}}}},"inputs":{"input_1":{"type":"input.timerange","title":"","options":{"token":"field1","defaultValue":"@w0,now"}}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"submitButton":false,"display":"auto-scale","height":750,"backgroundImage":{"sizeType":"cover","x":0,"y":0,"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://632fc89a5387a373511f5a04"}},"structure":[{"item":"viz_toFuD7zU","type":"block","position":{"x":690,"y":60,"w":490,"h":470}},{"item":"viz_chart_1","type":"block","position":{"x":30,"y":170,"w":660,"h":370}},{"item":"viz_single_1","type":"block","position":{"x":720,"y":110,"w":160,"h":140}},{"item":"viz_single_2","type":"block","position":{"x":950,"y":360,"w":100,"h":90}},{"item":"viz_single_3","type":"block","position":{"x":940,"y":110,"w":220,"h":160}},{"item":"viz_single_4","type":"block","position":{"x":720,"y":360,"w":100,"h":80}},{"item":"viz_0zW8CkST","type":"block","position":{"x":1090,"y":620,"w":60,"h":60}},{"item":"viz_EZhGHM6i","type":"block","position":{"x":710,"y":80,"w":230,"h":70}},{"item":"viz_RiOmzcJv","type":"block","position":{"x":710,"y":330,"w":230,"h":70}},{"item":"viz_lin4JUYd","type":"block","position":{"x":940,"y":310,"w":120,"h":70}},{"item":"viz_EPixlIbs","type":"block","position":{"x":930,"y":80,"w":230,"h":70}},{"item":"viz_xgZsQX7f","type":"block","position":{"x":490,"y":200,"w":160,"h":60}}],"globalInputs":["input_1"]},"description":"","title":"Activity"}
